title: Indonesian development action

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Indonesia - Economic conditions

description: Australian assistance to Indonesia includes research into agriculture and food production, and engineering works such as road building. Australia also provides training for these ventures, which ensures that Indonesia has her own qualified workers. Narrated by Clive Robertson.
